description: This file contains unit tests for the Angular template initialization and project setup in a software project. It uses pytest fixtures and tests various aspects such as template info retrieval, project directory creation, content replacement, post-processing execution, configuration loading, and template variable substitution.

methods.name: temp_dir
methods.description: Creates a temporary directory for test outputs.

methods.name: template_dir
methods.description: Sets up a mock template directory with configuration and template files for Angular.

methods.name: project_config
methods.description: Creates a mock project configuration for testing.

methods.name: test_angular_init_info
methods.description: Tests retrieval of template initialization info, ensuring key commands are present.

methods.name: test_project_initialization
methods.description: Verifies that project initialization creates the correct directory structure and content.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution
methods.description: Checks that post-processing scripts are executed and their effects are observed.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading
methods.description: Tests loading project configuration from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement
methods.description: Ensures template variables in files are correctly replaced with project info.
